title: Hideo Kojima, Animal Crossing Books Coming West - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.19.21
description:
Go to http://purple.com/games10 and use promo code games10 to get 10% off any order of $200 or more!

Go to http://expressvpn.com/games to get 3 extra months of ExpressVPN for FREE!

Go to http://logitechg.com and use code KindaFunnyDailyFreeShip215 to get express shipping!

Greg and Julia Hardy talk about Kojima's book, Animal Crossing manga, and more! Follow Julia: www.instagram.com/gametotrain

00:00:00 - Start
00:09:00 - Housekeeping
FCF Tomorrow! Beasts @ 5 pm PT
WandaVision Reactions!
New episode of The Blessing Show - Next Gen Four Months Later
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: GrahamOfLegend, David Meintel, Trent Berrie, Black Jack, Luiz Aguiar (@8bitLuiz), James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes), &The Nano Biologist
The Roper Report   -
00:12:50 - BOOKS!
00:21:50 - GDC Goes All Digital for 2021, Ian Carlos Campbell @ The Verge
00:26:40 - Fortnite News
00:32:10 -  Follow-Up from Yesterday: Tarsier is done with Little Nightmares, Bandai Ain’t, Joe Skrebbels @ IGN
00:34:30 -  Ad
00:42:35 - Out today
00:51:30 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:
Monday: Blessing and Tim
Tuesday: Greg and Gary Whitta
Wednesday: Blessing and Andrea Rene!
Thursday: Greg and Chelsea Blasko from Iron Galaxy
Friday: Greg and Blessing







Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!

Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Blessing Adeoye Jr., and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/

explore his personal inspirations that includes opinions and reviews of music films and books beloved by kojima the book will also include a conversation between kojima and musician slash actor jen hoshino whose song pop virus appears in death stranding here's viz's official synopsis of the book ever since he was a child metal gear solid and death stranding creator hideo kojima was a voracious consumer of movies music and books they ignited his passion for stories and storytelling and the results can be seen in his ground breaking iconic video games now the head of independent studio kojima productions kojima's enthusiasm for entertainment media has never waned this collection of essays explores some of the inspirations behind one of the titans of the video game industry and offers an exclusive insight into one of the brightest minds in pop culture the creative gene how books movies and music inspired the creator of death stranding and metal gear solid will be released october 12th
